text:
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes what a bunch of crap, the only person you care about is yourself, PERIOD
@realDonaldTrump believes that only 805,000 Coronavirus cases & almost 44,000 deaths shows what a great job he has done, the fact that he did NOTHING FOR 2 months while  calling it a hoax is IRRELEVANT NOT!
